topics.body:
Ok so everyone I know has been telling me to watch the Deadpool Comicon trailer and I was going to, then one guy said "It has the best Stan Lee cameo ever".

Now I don't want to watch anything until the movie comes out because I want to be surprised so this is going to be the first movie in which I'm going in blind.

This was 2 days ago. Urge to watch the trailer is increasing.

topics.body:
[bq]>"Watcha reading egghead?"
>You show her the cover, Night Shift
"Stephen King."
>"What's it about?"
"It's just a bunch of short stories."
>"Really? Read me one!"
>You hesitate, unsure if she knows what she's buying into
"These are fucking terrifying Dash."
>"Bring it on, I might have a pussy but I'm not a pussy."
>Ignoring her last comment, you go to the index to find your favorite[/bq]
